rows.label: qev015102_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hmm? Well, I'll be! It's the agent of justice!
You look like you've seen a ghost. Is something wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_JNK0010
rows.name: Query Specifically

rows.label: qev015102_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Justin whether he received a stuffed lobster recently.

rows.label: qev015102_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire Generally

rows.label: qev015102_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if Justin has noticed anything strange lately.

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0002
rows.name: A stuffed...lobster? Like a hunting trophy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0003
rows.name:
Oh, you mean a stuffed toy for children.
Yes, actually, I did receive one recently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0004
rows.name:
The note said it was from someone I helped on an
assignmentâ€”it was quite kind of them to remember.
But how did you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0005
rows.name:
Er, not really? Work's going well, I suppose.
Can't say I have anything of interest to report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0006
rows.name:
...Oh, I did receive a stuffed lobster toy in the mail.
The note said it was from someone I helped on an
assignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0007
rows.name:
No one on my team had ever received a thank-you like
that before, and they were all green with professional
envy. Er, does that count?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0008
rows.name: ...A bomb? And they were hidden all over the city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0009
rows.name:
...There were a hundred of them? Oh my word!
Good thing you went out and found the rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0010
rows.name:
Er, yes. Let me just hand this over to you...
But when you find the evil genius behind this crime,
bring down the mighty hammer of justice for me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0011
rows.name:
...It seems you've found the final piece, friend.
And my preparations here are complete as well.
Let's end this, shall we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'm inside the base of those useless puppets,
the Definians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0013
rows.name:
Don't keep me waiting. I'm so eager to see you,
I could just EXPLODE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_JNK0030
rows.name: Hang Up

rows.label: qev015102_SEL0031
rows.name: Terminate the Blood Lobster's call.

rows.label: qev015102_JNK0040
rows.name: Lose Temper

rows.label: qev015102_SEL0041
rows.name: Furiously demand to know the Blood Lobster's identity.

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0014
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0015
rows.name: Was that the criminal behind the bombs?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0016
rows.name:
Just promise me you won't lose, all right?
You are the city's greatest [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ], after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015102_MSG0017
rows.name:
I want you to prove that good triumphs over evil in
reality as well as in the stories.[ST:wait ]
